sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Button,
  Heading,
  Image,
  Spacer,
  Text,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import Shivam from "../Image/Shivam.JPG";
import Shivam_Resume from "../Components/Shivam_Resume.pdf";
import { Link, Navigate } from "react-router-dom";
import {
  AiFillGithub,
  AiFillLinkedin,
  AiOutlineMail,
  AiOutlinePhone,
} from "react-icons/ai";

import { Icon } from "@chakra-ui/react";
const About = () => {
  const resumeOpen = () => {
    window.open(Shivam_Resume);
  };

  return (
    <Box id="about" className="about section" p={10}>
      <Heading>About Me</Heading>
      <Box
        w="90%"
        h="100%"
        display="flex"
        flexDirection={["column", "column", "row"]}
        justifyContent="space-evenly"
        alignItems="center"
      >
        <Box w="40%">
          <Heading display="inline">
            Hey ! I'm
            <Heading display="inline" id="user-detail-name">
              Shivam
            </Heading>
          </Heading>
          <Text id="user-detail-intro">
            Strong in design and integration with intuitive problem-solving
            skills.Proficient in HTML,CSS,JAVASCRIPT and MERN STACK. Passionate
            about implementing and launching new projects
          </Text>
          <Button>CONTACT ME</Button>
          <Button id="resume-button-2" onClick={resumeOpen}>
            {" "}
            <Link
              to={Shivam_Resume}
              id="resume-link-2"
              target="_blank"
              download={true}
            >
              RESUME
            </Link>
          </Button>
          <Box display="flex" width="70%" justifyContent="space-between" pt={2}>
            <Box>
              <Icon as={AiFillGithub} fontSize="1rem" />
              <Text>Github</Text>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <Icon as={AiFillLinkedin} fontSize="1rem" />
              <Text>LinkedIN</Text>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <Icon as={AiOutlineMail} fontSize="1rem" />
              <Text>Gmail</Text>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <Icon as={AiOutlinePhone} fontSize="1rem" />
              <Text>Phone</Text>
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <Image
            className="home-img"
            borderRadius="full"
            boxSize="20rem"
            src={Shivam}
            alt="SHIVAM"
          />
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default About;
